## Problem Statement

A clear description of the problem you're trying to solve, or the gap in current functionality.

Example: "I'm always frustrated when..." or "It would be helpful if..."

## Proposed Solution

Describe the feature or enhancement you'd like to see.

## Use Case

How would you use this feature? Provide a concrete example.

```bash
# Example command or workflow
blackpaw start --scenario test --new-feature-flag
```

## Alternatives Considered

Have you considered any workarounds or alternative approaches?

## Additional Context

- Related issues or PRs
- Links to similar features in other tools
- Screenshots or mockups (if applicable)

## Scope

- [ ] This is a small enhancement (single feature)
- [ ] This requires multiple changes across the codebase
- [ ] This may require breaking changes

## Would you be willing to contribute this feature?

- [ ] Yes, I'd like to implement this
- [ ] I could help with testing
- [ ] I can only provide feedback
